content: {"locationId": "4971", "organizationId": "4183", "name": "Heard County Food Pantry", "address1": "1191 Franklin Pkwy", "address2": "", "city": "Franklin", "state": "GA", "zipCode": "30217", "country": null, "phone": "706-675-5344", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "33.27117", "longitude": "-85.09307", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Heard", "languages": "English", "features": "", "aboutUs": "Hello Neighbor! We are pleased to serve you each week on Friday from 8:30 a.m. to 12:00 p.m. We operate a drive-through distribution located on the back side of the Outpost Family Resource Center located at 1191 Franklin Parkway, Franklin, GA. Please be prepared to show your ID and, on your first visit, proof of Heard County residency. ", "notes": "Every Friday through June and July you can pick up meals for your kids from the summer food program offered by Heard County Schools when you come through the food pantry line. We will have the weekend meals beginning at 9:15 a.m. each Friday, while supplies last. These summer meals are available daily from Heard County High School. Order yours by 10 a.m. daily by texting 706-302-0812. Free meals available to individuals 18 years and under. ", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "706-675-5344", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "CSFP Program, Curbside Pickup / Drive Through, Lifting / Carrying Assistance, Outdoor Service, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 42, "regionName": "Atlanta Community Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "17b4255f-0222-445e-984f-653525137fd3.png", "website": "https://www.acfb.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Friday 8:00 AM-12:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
